text:
The water level in the Mettur dam stood at 69.49 feet on Thursday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level stood at 32.265 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc.

The inflow into the dam was 109 cusecs, and about 1,000 cusecs of water is discharged from the dam for farm activities in Cauvery delta districts, the PWD sources said.
title: Mettur Dam level
